summary: An ordinance levying a special assessment to redeem the annual installments and interest to mature and become payable upon the bonds of Local Improvement District No. 194 issued under authority of Ordinance No. 5499 for the improvement of East Denny Way, under Ordinance No. in accordance with the assessment roll of said district as approved by Ordinance No. providing for the collection thereof, and providing penalties for non-payment at maturity.
